Title: Grants medical assistance eligibility for organ transplant expenses for certain residents of New York
Summary: Grants medical assistance eligibility for organ transplant expenses for residents of New York who are otherwise eligible for benefits except for their immigration status.
LawCode: Amd ยง365-a, Soc Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law, in relation to authorizing the payment of medical assistance for the provision of organ transplants for certain residents of New York
